attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ensure the quick return of a producing theatre in Derby that provides jobs, education, industry, artistry and entertainment. It is a valuable, nationally acclaimed cultural asset to the midlands region that deserves support to overcome the impact of difficult trading position while being at the centre of a large scale shopping development. It had shown it had made it through the worst of the situation and closure is both premature and damaging to the region both commercially and culturally.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Save Derby Playhouse."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15109.asp

Prime Minister's Office
